TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PSContextInfo extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.IPSContextInfo, class Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.ITextConvCultureProvider
type PSContextInfo = class interface IPSContextInfo interface ITextConvCultureProvider

Docs.summary: Contains Project Server context information for user identity, Project Web App site, and preferred culture.

remarks.para: The PSContextInfo class uses the interface.
For an example that uses the PSContextInfo class, see How to: Use Impersonation with WCF.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constructor exists for Project Server 2007 backward-compatibility.")

Docs.param: Specifies whether to use Windows authentication.
The GUID for tracking the queue job.
The GUID of the Project Web App site.
The locale code ID. Use language and local culture instead.
Docs.summary: This constructor exists for Microsoft Office Project Server 2007 backward compatibility. Use a constructor that enables the language and locale culture to be specified.

Docs.param: Specifies whether to use Windows authentication.
The GUID for tracking the queue job.
The GUID of the Project Web App site.
The language culture, which is used for localizing strings and the user interface.
The locale culture, which is used for formatting numbers, dates, and currency values.
Docs.summary: This constructor exists for Project Server 2013 backward compatibility. Creates a PSContextInfo object that includes language and locale culture information.

Docs.param: Specifies whether to use Windows authentication.
The GUID for tracking the queue job.
The GUID of the Project Web App site.
The language culture, which is used for localizing strings and the user interface.
The locale culture, which is used for formatting numbers, dates, and currency values.
The GUID of the delegate for the user.

Docs.summary: This constructor exists for Project Server 2013 backward compatibility. Creates a PSContextInfo object that includes language and locale culture information, and specifies a user delegate.
